languages.text: {n}Вопрос приводит старца в жуткий ажиотаж — почтенный когитатор столь гневно и путано излагает свои мысли, что понять его невозможно. Ваши технокоманды лишь больше злят духа.{/n}

{n}Your question upsets the spirit terribly — the honoured cogitator is so incensed and erratic in its expression that you cannot comprehend what it is trying to say. Your tech-commands only exacerbate its anger.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вопрос приводит старца в жуткий ажиотаж — почтенный когитатор столь гневно и путано излагает свои мысли, что понять его невозможно. Ваши технокоманды лишь больше злят духа.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Your question upsets the spirit terribly — the honoured cogitator is so incensed and erratic in its expression that you cannot comprehend what it is trying to say. Your tech-commands only worsen its anger.{/n}

{n}Your question upsets the spirit terribly — the honoured cogitator is so incensed and erratic in its expression that you cannot comprehend what it is trying to say. Your tech-commands only exacerbate its anger.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Votre question plonge l'esprit dans une colère noire. Hors de lui, le vénérable cogitateur s'exprime avec une incohérence telle que ses propos vous échappent complètement. Vos technocommandes successives ne font qu'exacerber sa fureur.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your question upsets the spirit terribly — the honoured cogitator is so incensed and erratic in its expression that you cannot comprehend what it is trying to say. Your tech-commands only exacerbate its anger.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Votre question plonge l'esprit dans une colère noire. Hors de lui, le vénérable cogitateur s'exprime avec une incohérence telle que ses propos vous échappent complètement. Vos technocommandes successives ne font qu'exacerber sa fureur.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tu pregunta enfada mucho al espíritu: el honorable cogitador está tan furioso y errático que no puedes comprender lo que intenta decir. Tus tecnocomandos solo alimentan su ira.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your question upsets the spirit terribly — the honoured cogitator is so incensed and erratic in its expression that you cannot comprehend what it is trying to say. Your tech-commands only exacerbate its anger.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tu pregunta enfada mucho al espíritu: el honorable cogitador está tan furioso y errático que no puedes comprender lo que intenta decir. Tus tecnocomandos solo alimentan su ira.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你的问题让机魂极其不安。这台可敬的沉思者变得愤怒不已，答复也变得飘忽不定，你根本无法理解它想传达的意思。看来，你的技术命令仅仅是进一步激怒了它。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your question upsets the spirit terribly — the honoured cogitator is so incensed and erratic in its expression that you cannot comprehend what it is trying to say. Your tech-commands only exacerbate its anger.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你的问题让机魂极其不安。这台可敬的沉思者变得愤怒不已，答复也变得飘忽不定，你根本无法理解它想传达的意思。看来，你的技术命令仅仅是进一步激怒了它。{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたの質問は精霊を怒らせた。 この名誉あるコジテーターは激昂し、表情もおかしい。何を言おうとしているのか全く分からない。どうやら、あなたのテク・コマンドは怒りを悪化させるだけだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your question upsets the spirit terribly — the honoured cogitator is so incensed and erratic in its expression that you cannot comprehend what it is trying to say. Your tech-commands only exacerbate its anger.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの質問は精霊を怒らせた。 この名誉あるコジテーターは激昂し、表情もおかしい。何を言おうとしているのか全く分からない。どうやら、あなたのテク・コマンドは怒りを悪化させるだけだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Deine Frage versetzt den Geist in helle Aufregung. Der ehrwürdige Cogitator ist derart aufgebracht und wirr in seinem Ausdruck, dass du nicht verstehst, was er zu sagen versucht. Deine Tech-Befehle steigern seine Wut nur noch.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your question upsets the spirit terribly — the honoured cogitator is so incensed and erratic in its expression that you cannot comprehend what it is trying to say. Your tech-commands only exacerbate its anger.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Deine Frage versetzt den Geist in helle Aufregung. Der ehrwürdige Cogitator ist derart aufgebracht und wirr in seinem Ausdruck, dass du nicht verstehst, was er zu sagen versucht. Deine Tech-Befehle steigern seine Wut nur noch.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sorduğun soru, ruhu derinden incitiyor. Onurlu kavramsayar, öylesine öfkeli ve istikrarsız bir mizaca bürünüyor ki söylemeye çalıştıklarını algılayamıyorsun. Tekno komutların, yalnızca öfkesini şiddetlendirmeye yarıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your question upsets the spirit terribly — the honoured cogitator is so incensed and erratic in its expression that you cannot comprehend what it is trying to say. Your tech-commands only exacerbate its anger.{/n}
